duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support for Microsoft Windows Servers in a VMware vSphere environment and services hosted in Microsoft Azure.
Assist with upgrades, maintenance, migrations, and new implementations.
Write scripts, templates, and customize applications to improve functionality.
Act as escalation resource for IT support teams for issues encountered on servers, desktops, VMware, Azure, and Office 365.
Deploy applications and updates to desktops using software deployment tools.
Develop and maintain standard operating procedures and system documentation.
Perform IT training for new IT staff as required.
Active Directory administration, Azure AD Configuration, and Intune configuration and troubleshooting.
Knowledge of systems backups and recovery procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in information technology or a related field from an accredited college or university
